snippet: George Braith, 72, creates jazz out of an unusual instrument of his own design -- the Braithophone, which he made by welding together two saxophones.
abstract: George Braith, 72, creates jazz out of an unusual instrument of his own design -- the Braithophone, which he made by welding together two saxophones.

headline.main: Creating a Sound That's All His Own
headline.print_headline: Inventing Horn Sound Of His Own
